note.p: Death: Delahay House, 15 Chelsea Embankment, London (22 January 1918)
Education: Kings College, London; pupil of Sir John Hawkshaw (FRS 1855)
Career: Undertook railway engineering work, London; engineer for Blackfriar's Bridge, London; built Tower Bridge, London (completed 1894);
Memberships: British Engineering Standards Association (a founder member, 1901-2)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1917-1918 vol 94 pp xxxv-xxxviii, plate, signed by W C U
